channel.title: HOW to ad a max player limit?
channel.description: I got this cool server but whenever it hits more than 15 players it starts to lagg, help will turn into an admin character on the server wich will be 24/7 soon and hold over 100 people after I buy more ram. So if anyone can tell me how to do it I will reward nicely. Its a good server People ask admin alot and offer high.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 24, 2007, 02:16:15 PM[/size][hr]C'MON... There must be someone able to answer on this question. Since it is done alot!

item.title: HOW to ad a max player limit?
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

i can hold 900-950 players with 1 GB ram 40-65% cpu usage

bad coding your fault fix your server base to allow more players.

I’ll try to make a tutorial fixing some RS2 base I download to support many more players.

Read full topic

item.title: HOW to ad a max player limit?
item.dc:creator: @chaos_666 chaos 666
item.description:
@chaos_666 wrote:

[code]public void killServer() {
try {
shutdownClientHandler = true;
if(clientListener != null) clientListener.close();
clientListener = null;
} catch(java.lang.Exception __ex) {
__ex.printStackTrace();
}
}

public static int EnergyRegian = 60;

public static int MaxConnections =15;
public static String[] Connections = new String[MaxConnections];
public static int[] ConnectionCount = new int[MaxConnections];
public static boolean ShutDown = false;
public static int ShutDownCounter = 0;

}[/code]

Thats how it looks around the code, anything wrong there?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 24, 2007, 02:32:32 PM[/size][hr][quote=“bakatool, post:4, topic:115998”]compile[/quote]

I compiled.
